import { useState } from 'react'; import './App.css'; function App() { const [weather, setWeather]= useState([]) const[search, setSearch] = useState('') const searchPressed = ()=>{ fetch(`https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=oran&appid=16e195f24f8e11e20cf225c63314fb1f`) .then(res=>res.json()) .then(data=>setWeather(data)) } const temp = weather.main.temp; const temp1 = Math.floor(temp); const tempMax = weather.main.temp_max; const tempMax1 = Math.floor(tempMax); const tempMin = weather.main.temp_min; const tempMin1 = Math.floor(tempMin); const feels = weather.main.feels_like; const feels1 = Math.floor(feels) const wind = weather.wind.speed; const wind1 = Math.floor(wind) return (
